The arbitrator is trusted to support appeal period and not reenter.","params":{"_arbitrator":"The new trusted arbitrator to be used in the next requests.","_arbitratorExtraData":"The extra data used by the new arbitrator."}},"constructor":{"details":"Constructor.","params":{"_admin":"The administrator of the contract.","_arbitrator":"The arbitrator of the contract.","_arbitratorExtraData":"Extra data for the arbitrator.","_buyerTimeout":"The payment timeout for the buyer.","_loserStakeMultiplier":"Multiplier of the appeal cost that the loser          has to pay for a round. Can only be called by the arbitrator. TRUSTED. Account for the situation where the winner loses a case due to paying less appeal fees than expected.","params":{"_disputeID":"ID of the dispute in the arbitrator contract.","_ruling":"Ruling given by the arbitrator. s/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x032807210d1d7d218963d7355d62e021a84bf1b3339f4f50be2f63b53cccaf29","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://11756f42121f6541a35a8339ea899ee7514cfaa2e6d740625fcc844419296aa6","dweb:/ipfs/QmekMuk6BY4DAjzeXr4MSbKdgoqqsZnA8JPtuyWc6CwXHf"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9720545d8ea1f76222f98683f861f919e9c28bd5d5503caa7e3620a21b6aaa24","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fe3dac0e0258d8396c33fd27c277699a9bfac198f2cb45632c4f5df2c2ca895a","dweb:/ipfs/QmfEWsX7aGpWN9wooHiQo1XjiGM1h6iXeaeMTAJ1TUcnts"]},"src/Unipeer.sol":{"keccak256":"0xebbe9bdd5f138c9f5af5064b118e9c6fe8d72b289df014e807aa558e9310bad6","license":"GPL-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://81ff7a7c35a0795cba3991adbb7a8bfaf317589f0e9266b4f23e1d9ceccef781","dweb:/ipfs/QmT1qeA9ebRswVn8Go4sZkmEdKinfe9ckvAriXvsUXr9jK"]}},"version":1}

addMetaEvidence(string).details: Add a new meta evidence used for disputes.

params._metaEvidence: The meta evidence to be used for future disputes requests. returns metaEvidenceID The ID of the associated meta evidence that can be then linked to a payment method.

batchRoundWithdraw(address,uint256,uint2.details: Withdraws contributions of multiple appeal rounds at once. This function is O(n) where n is the number of rounds. This could exceed the gas limit, therefore this function should be used only as a utility and not be relied upon by other contracts.

params._count: The number of rounds to iterate. If set to 0 or a value larger than the number of rounds, iterates until the last round.
params._cursor: The round from where to start withdrawing.
params._orderID: The ID of the resolved order.

changeArbitrator(address,bytes).details: Change the arbitrator to be used for disputes. The arbitrator is trusted to support appeal period and not reenter.

params._arbitrator: The new trusted arbitrator to be used in the next requests.
params._arbitratorExtraData: The extra data used by the new arbitrator.

params._buyerTimeout: The payment timeout for the buyer.
params._loserStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of the appeal cost that the loser          has to pay for a round. In basis points.
params._sellerTimeout: The interaction timeout for the seller.
params._sharedStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of the appeal cost that the          submitter must pay for a round when there is no winner/loser in          the previous round. In basis points.
params._tradeFeeRate: The feeRate by MULTIPLE_DIVISOR for accruing          protocol fees.
params._winnerStakeMultiplier: Multiplier of the appeal cost that the winner          has to pay for a round. In basis points.

fundAppeal(uint256,uint8).details: Takes up to the total amount required to fund a side of an appeal. Reimburses the rest. Creates an appeal if both sides are fully funded.

params._orderID: The ID of the buy order.
params._side: The party that pays the appeal fee.

getContributions(uint256,uint256,address.details: Gets the contributions made by a party for a given round of the appeal.

getNumberOfRounds(uint256).details: Gets the number of rounds of the specific order.

getRoundInfo(uint256,uint256).details: Gets the information on a round of a order.

rule(uint256,uint256).details: Give a ruling for a dispute. Can only be called by the arbitrator. TRUSTED. Account for the situation where the winner loses a case due to paying less appeal fees than expected.

params._disputeID: ID of the dispute in the arbitrator contract.
params._ruling: Ruling given by the arbitrator. Note that 0 is reserved for "Refused to arbitrate".

submitEvidence(uint256,string).details: Submit a reference to evidence. EVENT.

params._evidence: A link to an evidence using its URI.
params._orderID: The index of the order. Used as EvidenceGroupID

params._feeRate: The fee rate charged by the seller for  this payment method
params._paymentAddress: The payment address the seller will  accept off-chain payments on
params._paymentID: The ID of the payment method

withdrawFeesAndRewards(address,uint256,u.details: Withdraws contributions of appeal rounds. Reimburses contributions if the appeal was not fully funded. If the appeal was fully funded, sends the fee stake rewards and reimbursements proportional to the contributions made to the winner of a dispute.

params._orderID: The ID of the resolved order.
params._round: The round from which to withdraw.

completeOrder(uint256).notice: Called by a seller to mark an order complete It can timeout and default to confirmed if the seller doesn't respond.

updateSellerPaymentMethod(uint256,string.notice: Accept or disable a payment method by a seller for orders. A payment method can be disabled by setting it to an empty string.
